functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: function calculate and return balance of user.

functionDecorators.name: buy
functionDecorators.description: function to purchase collateral buy sending tokens. user must approve to spend equivalent amount of tokens to smart contract address(system) for ethereum default storage will be 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 as token address.

functionDecorators.name: buyPrice
functionDecorators.description: function to get current purchase price of single collateral. This price is determined based on current price plus incremental price factor.

functionDecorators.name: buyWithETH
functionDecorators.description: function to purchase collateral buy sending ETH. user must approve to spend equivalent amount of tokens to smart contract address(system) for ethereum default storage will be 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 as token address.

functionDecorators.name: collateralToToken
functionDecorators.description: function to calculate number of tokens user will receive when selling ccollateral. This is calculated by deducting 10% system fees.

functionDecorators.name: dividendOf
functionDecorators.description: function calculate and return dividend of user this dividend is calculated based dividend per collatral multiple collatral holding minus reinvested dividend amount.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: referralDividendOf
functionDecorators.description: function calculate and return referral dividend of user user must invest in any 1 token to enable referral.

functionDecorators.name: reinvest
functionDecorators.description: function to reinvest divided received on collatral.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: sell
functionDecorators.description: function to calculate tokenm collatral value and store in system structure.

functionDecorators.name: sellPrice
functionDecorators.description: function to get current sell price of single collateral. This price is determined based on current price minus incremental price factor.

functionDecorators.name: supplyOf
functionDecorators.description: function to get supply of collatral.

functionDecorators.name: swapTokenContract
functionDecorators.description: function to process swapping of user balance to new token contract address in case project decide to swap ERC-20 token This function will be used only when project team sent equivalent new contract in system token without asking for old tokens token swap ratio must be same this will protect users from price crash due to token sell for swapping.

functionDecorators.name: tokenList
functionDecorators.description: function to return active tokens list in system.

functionDecorators.name: tokentoCollateral
functionDecorators.description: function to calculate number of collateral user will receive when investing tokens. This is calculated by deducting 10% system fees.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: walletList
functionDecorators.description: function to return active wallets list in system.
